detail_desc: Joggers in soft denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High, elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and back pockets. Relaxed fit with straight legs and elasticated hems.
Patterned running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, small zipped pocket at the back and a zip at the hems.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist. Lined.
Vest top in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck front and back and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames, glittery sections at the front and tinted, UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
Straight-cut cardigan in fine-knit long-staple cotton with a silver-plated zip down the front. Ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Calf-length dress in a cupro and viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, a sewn-in wrapover at the front with a decorative tie detail at one side, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Long sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Round-necked blouse in an airy weave with short, flounced sleeves. Opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem with decorative embroidery.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in felted fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The lining is made from recycled polyester.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with embroidery. at the top. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a wide neckline, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trainers in cotton with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Pre-tied bow tie in satin with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 9.5 cm.
Longer, wide-fitting jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with quilted details, zips in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine loose knit with slits at the hem and no fasteners. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top, both front and back to create soft draping. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, long balloon sleeves with close-fitting, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with a frilled collar. Deep opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck and back. Long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seams creating tiers at the waist and hips. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a sewn-on bow tie and double-layered front with a sewn-on waistcoat in a linen blend. Waistcoat with a press-stud on one shoulder, buttons down the front and a fake chest pocket. Shorts with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a decorative button, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined, cropped vest top in sturdy jersey with visible seams. Racer back with a cut-out section, and wide elastication at the hem.
5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with a zip fly, slit at the front and raw-edge hem.
Slides with a faux fur strap and moulded rubber soles.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, 5-pocket, low-rise shorts in soft, superstretch denim that showcase the body’s physique. Zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Capri leggings in soft stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and short slits at the hems.
Lace push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Long jumper knitted in an alpaca and wool blend. High stand-up collar with a zip, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, and print motif on the front. Short sleeves with ribbed trims. Appliqué on one sleeve.

Dress in an airy cotton weave with a square neckline, small opening with a button at the back and flounces at the top that continue up over the shoulders. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Short-sleeved jersey top.
Hat in a soft, garter-stitched cotton blend with small knitted ears on top.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, loose knit with a wide neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Padded jacket in a lightly brushed, velvety-smooth weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Slightly longer at the back. Pile lining.
Sleeveless dress in soft slub cotton jersey with a lace-covered bodice at the front, gathered seam at the waist and skirt that is slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Thin metal chain necklace with three pendants in different designs that can be worn individually or together. Adjustable length 39-46 cm.
Bandeau bikini top with a silicone trim at the top and lined cups with removable inserts and side support. Detachable ties at the back of the neck and wide ties at the back.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short dress in glittery mesh with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt with a raw-edge hem.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and zipped front pockets. Inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and side pockets.
Fitted, lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and extra long sleeves with thumbholes.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a high collar and zip at the top with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with a concealed button at the front, and short cap sleeves.
Ribbed V-neck top in airy jersey with a slight sheen, narrow shoulder straps and lace trims around the neckline and hem.
Straight-style jumper in a knit made partly from recycled polyester with a rib-knit polo neck. Dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck with buttons at the top and pleats on the chest. Seam at the waist with a tie detail, pleats and gathers at the front, gathers at the back, pockets in the side seams and long, wide legs.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Metal earrings in the shape of thin hoops in various designs. Size 1.2 cm to 3 cm.
Pull-on jeans in soft, superstretch denim with jersey ribbing at the waist and a fake fly with a decorative button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Short dress in printed tulle with embroidery and appliqués on the front, a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, and a gathered, frill-trimmed seam at the waist. Jersey inner dress.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool and cashmere with a faux fur pompom on top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide polo neck, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in a soft weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, tie belt, decorative buttons down the front and side pockets. Unlined.
Short, straight-style, double-breasted coat in woven fabric containing some wool. Notch lapels, dropped shoulders and large patch pockets at the front. Lined.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and an imitation suede flap with a fastener. One inner compartment and one outer compartment with a zip. Lined. Height 18 cm. Width 23 cm.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Shirt dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Lace tights with an elasticated waist.

Dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket and imitation suede belt. Chest pocket with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a tab and button. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Dressing gown in soft, organic cotton terry with a hood and wrapover front with a button fastening. Patterned jersey lining.
Fully lined bikinis. Triangle top with an adjustable strap at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bikini bottoms.
Lined, push-up triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Short, off-the-shoulder jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.

Chino shorts in a linen and cotton weave with a zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Skinny fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Platform sandals in imitation suede decorated with a wide metal chain at the front. Adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Platform front 3 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
